name: unprojectPoint(_:ontoPlane:orientation:viewportSize:)
desc: Returns the projection of a point from the 2D space of a view rendering the scene onto a plane in the 3D world space detected by ARKit.
declaration: @nonobjc func unprojectPoint(_ point: CGPoint, ontoPlane planeTransform: simd_float4x4, orientation: UIInterfaceOrientation, viewportSize: CGSize) -> simd_float3?
